show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
This Project Censored show features Mickey Huff in Studio with Peter Phillips interviewing Dr. <!--more--> Thomas Moore, the author of the new book “A Religion of One’s Own.”  Thomas Moore was monk for twelve years, and also an university professor, musician and psychotherapist.He has written several books including the best seller “Care of the Soul.
” He holds a PhD in religion from Syracuse University.
